text: Letter dated 7 January 2025 from the President of the Security Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 24 December 2024 (S/2025/14), concerning your intention to continue the activities of the United Nations support team to the Cameroon-Nigeria Mixed Commission, with funding from the regular budget, has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the information contained in your letter and the intention expressed therein.
